title: Differentiated Instruction Strategy Development Through Action Research-Based Teacher Collaboration Design

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of foundational pedagogical concepts and lesson design experience
context.additional_context: Focus on practical collaborative learning to cultivate differentiated instruction competencies required in educational settings

learning_goals: Can develop systematic observation tools to diagnose student diversity (readiness, learning profiles)
Can collaboratively design three or more differentiated lesson plans with peer teachers based on situational contexts
Can apply action research methodology to analyze feedback data after instruction and derive two or more improvement strategies

resources: Differentiated Instruction Reference Books and Papers

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
